summary: This bill, H.R. 3047, mandates that the Director of the Court Services and Offender Supervision Agency (CSOSA) and the Director of the Pretrial Services Agency for the District of Columbia must reside in the District of Columbia. It amends existing District of Columbia Official Codes related to their compensation and residency requirements, and notes the effective date as the date of enactment. This ensures local accountability from the heads of these agencies.
